actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $4,800 the amount of outside earnings permitted without deductions from benefits thereunder.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase to $4,800 the amount of outside earnings permitted an individual each year without any deduction from benefits under such title.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to increase to $4,800 the amount of outside earnings permitted without deductions from benefits thereunder.
